trans-unit.source: Represents a service that provides properties, methods, and events to enable and manage KeyTips in WPF <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> controls.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.ActivatingKeyTip"></xref> routed event.
Adds the routed event handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.ActivatingKeyTip"></xref> event.
The identifier of the routed event for which the handler is attached.
The specific handler implementation to add to the event handler collection on this element.
Adds the routed event handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.KeyTipAccessed"></xref> event.
The identifier of the routed event for which the handler is attached.
The specific handler implementation to add to the event handler collection on this element.
Adds the routed event handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.PreviewKeyTipAccessed"></xref> event.
The identifier of the routed event for which the handler is attached.
The specific handler implementation to add to the event handler collection on this element.
Hides the KeyTips that are currently displayed.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.IsKeyTipScope"></xref> attached property for the specified element.
The object from which the property value is read.
The object’s <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.IsKeyTipScope"></xref> property value.
The specified element is `null`.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.KeyTip"></xref> attached property for the specified element.
The object from which the property value is read.
The object’s <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.KeyTip"></xref> property value.
The specified element is `null`.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.KeyTipStyle"></xref> attached property for the specified element.
The object from which the property value is read.
The object’s <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.KeyTipStyle"></xref> property value.
The specified element is `null`.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.IsKeyTipScope"></xref> dependency property.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.KeyTipAccessed"></xref> routed event.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.KeyTip"></xref> dependency property.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.KeyTipStyle"></xref> dependency property.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.PreviewKeyTipAccessed"></xref> routed event.
Removes the routed event handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.ActivatingKeyTip"></xref> event.
The identifier of the routed event for which the handler is attached.
The specific handler implementation to remove from the event handler collection on this element.
Removes the routed event handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.KeyTipAccessed"></xref> event.
The identifier of the routed event for which the handler is attached.
The specific handler implementation to remove from the event handler collection on this element.
Removes the routed event handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.PreviewKeyTipAccessed"></xref> event.
The identifier of the routed event for which the handler is attached.
The specific handler implementation to remove from the event handler collection on this element.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.IsKeyTipScope"></xref> attached property for the specified element.
The object to which the attached property is written.
The value to set.
The specified element is `null`.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.KeyTip"></xref> attached property for the specified element.
The object to which the attached property is written.
The value to set.
The specified element is `null`.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.KeyTipStyle"></xref> attached property for the specified element.
The object to which the attached property is written.
The value to set.
The specified element is `null`.
